div.p: Categorization of CpG-SNPs and CpG-CNVs found among domesticated breeds of chickens and RJF. (a) Plot depicting the incidence of CpG-SNPs in the domesticated breeds in relation to RJF (* depicts P < 0.001; Chi-Square). (b) Venn diagram showing CpG-SNPs emerging between the domesticated breeds analysed and RJF. (c) Venn diagram showing base pairs covered by CpG-CNVs emerging between the domesticated breeds analysed and RJF.
